Left Menu Bar
=============

You can access the main sections of Answer via the menu.

**Home**: navigate to the homepage

**Open Case >** : open and work on a case you are assigned to. Only your cases are listed.

**Open Report >** : open and work on reports you are assigned to. Only cases ready for reports are listed.

**Annotations**: create annotations and trials outside of a case

**Preferences**: show the permissions on your account and edit your preferences such as column orders for tables.

**Help**: open this page

**Logout**: close your session. You will have to log in again. Your session expires automatically after 30 min of inactivity.
